DOC.brief_title: Effects Myofascial Trigger Point Dry Cupping Plantar Heel Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Plantar heel pain condition often see healthcare provider . It present pain tenderness heel weight bearing activity . Approximately 15 % athletic non-athletic adult foot complaint seek professional care plantar heel pain . There different name definition condition literature plantar heel pain , plantar fasciitis , plantar fasciosis , plantar fasciopathy , heel spur syndrome , jogger 's heel . The reason inconsistency define condition due disagreement underlie pathology . A number condition may result plantar heel pain , namely plantar fasciitis ( common ) , calcaneus fracture , heel fat pad atrophy , peripheral nerve dysfunction . Recently , several study show myofascial trigger point ( MTrPs ) tender point calf muscle may associate plantar heel pain . Many study determine risk factor development plantar heel pain , classify either intrinsic extrinsic . Intrinsic risk factor comprise anatomical ( ROM ankle subtalar joint position ) demographic characteristic individual ( age , gender , weight height ) . Extrinsic risk factor relate mainly subject 's activity environment , run hard surface , time spent weight bearing , previous injury . All factor lead increase mechanical load foot , specifically plantar fascia . Treatment plantar heel pain usually target plantar fascia structure plantar heel area use several intervention cortisone injection , therapeutic ultrasound , laser , ice , heel pad , night splint . Evidence varies regard effectiveness intervention . The main aim study investigate immediate carry-over effect dry cup calf muscle trigger point pain function patient plantar heel pain .
DOC.criteria: Unilateral plantar heel pain . Trigger point ( ) gastrocnemius/soleus muscle ( ) . Central centromedial tenderness plantar aspect heel . Red flag : tumor , fracture , rheumatoid arthritis , osteoporosis , severe vascular condition lower limb . Neurological symptom : sciatica , tarsal tunnel syndrome . Previous surgery affect leg hip . Fibromyalgia . Previous manual therapy treatment condition within past 6 month . History three corticosteroid injection within past year .
